title: FS: Raw T206 Chief Bender w/ Trees
author: vintagegem2

posts.post_title: FS: Raw T206 Chief Bender w/ Trees
posts.post_content:
Piedmont back.  The front of the card presents very well, but does have some edge wear.  The back is the real issue here, but I hope I can fill a hole in someone's lower grade set.  $50 including s/h; Paypal (money owed), check or MO accepted.
